attributes.action: Stop non British citizen terrorist suspects held at Guantanamo Bay from entering the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The repatriation of terrorist suspects held by the US forces at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, who are not British citizens is an affront to all law abiding British citizens.  Such action gives the impression that the UK is a haven for terrorists from whatever country and can do not less than give encouragement to those engaged in terrorism or supporting terrorist activities including those already resident in the UK.
